body:
I have a ppc64le system, can you please supply a small test program that
demonstrates the problem and I'll try to reproduce and diagnose it.

On Tue, 17 Nov 2015, 00:19 Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> If sockets didn't work in ppc64, how would all.bash pass for
> http://build.golang.org/? I see a big happy column of "ok" for ppc64.
>
> Is this specifically a centos old kernel problem, or ...?
>
